```{r, echo = FALSE}

sup_data <- read.csv("C:/Users/megan/Desktop/806_final/supp_data1.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

lake_data <- read.csv("C:/Users/megan/Desktop/806_final/lake_data1.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

otu_data <- read.csv("C:/Users/megan/Desktop/806_final/otu_data1.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

rel_abun <- read.csv("C:/Users/megan/Desktop/806_final/rel_abun1.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}

comb1 <- right_join(otu_data, rel_abun, by = "OTU")
comb2 <- right_join(sup_data, lake_data)
database <- full_join(comb1, comb2)


```

```{r, echo = FALSE}

library(ggplot2)
select(database, Lake, Phylum, value, Year, Month, Day, Layer) %>%
  filter(Lake == "Crystal Bog", value > 5, Year == "2009", Month == "JUN") %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(fill = Phylum, x = Layer, y = value, color = Phylum)) + geom_bar(position="stack", stat="identity") + labs(x = "Layer", y = "Abundance")

```
